{{disambig-more: '''''Poems from The Hobbit''''' is a compilation of poems from ''[[The Hobbit]]''.

Poem: THE HOBBIT]]'' is an epic tale of magical adventure that has captivated children and adults for more than sixty years. Its success comes from its combination of flawless storytelling and enchanting writing, including these twelve delightful poems. This miniature book, illustrated with thirty of Tolkien's own paintings and drawings, contains all the poems, plus [[Gollum]]'s eight famous riddles, and will be a perfect keepsake for lovers of THE HOBBIT and Tolkien's [[Middle-earth]].
